00017 import java.io.InputStream;

00020 import javax.microedition.io.Connector;

00035 public class HTTPGoogleAPI {
00036 
00037         public class ParseType {
00038                 public static final int ADDRESS = 1;
00039                 public static final int CITY = 2;
00040                 public static final int STATE = 3;
00041                 public static final int ZIP = 4;
00042         }
00043 
00044         public static final int MIN_ACCURACY_LEVEL = 6;
00045         public static final int MAX_ADDRESS_RESULTS = 8;
00046         
00047         /*
00048          * GEOCODE ACCURACY LEVELS 0 Unknown accuracy. 1 Country level accuracy. 2
00049          * Region (state, province, prefecture, etc.) level accuracy. 3 Sub-region
00050          * (county, municipality, etc.) level accuracy. 4 Town (city, village) level
00051          * accuracy. 5 Post code (zip code) level accuracy. 6 Street level accuracy.
00052          * 7 Intersection level accuracy. 8 Address level accuracy. 9 Premise
00053          * (building name, property name, shopping center, etc.) level accuracy.
00054          */
00055 
00064         public static String ReverseGeoQuery(double lat, double lon) {
00065 
00066                 String response = null;
00067 
00068                 StringBuffer url = new StringBuffer();
00069                 url.append("http://maps.google.com/maps/geo?");
00070                 url.append("q=" + Double.toString(lat) + "," + Double.toString(lon));
00071                 url.append("&output=json&sensor=true_or_false");
00072 
00073                 try {
00074 
00075                         // String result = post(url.toString());
00076                         response = getPage(url.toString());
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 // TODO clean up empty catch
00080                 catch (Exception e) {
00081                         System.out.println("HTTPGoogleAPI.getPage Exception: "
00082                                         + e.toString());
00083                 }
00084 
00085                 return response;
00086         }

00089         /*
00090          * getPage - sample code from web for getting simple page results TODO clean
00091          * up code for error conditions and remove the 255 response limit
00092          */
00093         private static String getPage(String url) {
00094 
00095                 String response = null;
00096                 StreamConnection s = null;
00097                 
00098                 try {
00099                         // try wifi network connection first
00100                         s = (StreamConnection) Connector.open(url + ";deviceside=true;interface=wifi");                 
00101                 }
00102                 catch (Exception e) {
00103                         // no-op; failure to open a wi-fi connection is quite likely
00104                 }
00105                 
00106                 try {
00107                         // wi-fi failed so try normal network connection
00108                         if (s == null) {
00109                                 s = (StreamConnection) Connector.open(url);
00110                         }
00111                         
00112                         // still no good - time to bail
00113                         if (s == null) return response;
00114                         
00115                         InputStream input = s.openInputStream();
00116 
00117                         byte[] data = new byte[256];
00118                         int len = 0;
00119                         StringBuffer raw = new StringBuffer();
00120 
00121                         while (-1 != (len = input.read(data))) {
00122                                 raw.append(new String(data, 0, len));
00123                         }
00124 
00125                         response = raw.toString();
00126 
00127                         input.close();
00128                         s.close();
00129                 }
00130                 // TODO clean up empty catch
00131                 catch (Exception e) {
00132                         System.out.println("StreamConnection Exception: " + e.toString());
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 return response;
00136         }

00145         public static String[] getAddressList(String _str)
00146         {
00147                 String[] response = null;
00148                 Vector addrList = new Vector();
00149                 
00150                 String startAddressParseKey = "\"address\": ";
00151                 String endParseKey = ",\n";
00152                 String accuracyParseKey = "\"Accuracy\" :";
00153                 
00154                 int accuracyLevel = 0;
00155                 int beginIndex = 0;
00156                 int endIndex = 0;
00157                 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ADDRESS_RESULTS; i++)
00158                 {
00159                         try {
00160                                 beginIndex = _str.indexOf(startAddressParseKey, beginIndex) + startAddressParseKey.length() + 1;
00161                                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(endParseKey, beginIndex) - 1;
00162                                 String fullAddress = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00163                                 
00164                                 beginIndex = endIndex + 1;
00165                                 beginIndex = _str.indexOf(accuracyParseKey, beginIndex) + accuracyParseKey.length() + 1;
00166                                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(endParseKey, beginIndex);
00167                                 
00168                                 String accStr = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00169                                 accuracyLevel = Integer.parseInt(accStr.trim());
00170                                 
00171                                 
00172                                 // only add items that meet minimum accuracy levels
00173                                 if ( accuracyLevel >= MIN_ACCURACY_LEVEL ) {
00174                                         addrList.addElement(fullAddress);
00175                                 }
00176                                 else {
00177                                         // remaining results will be at or below this accuracy, so we can break and return
00178                                         break;
00179                                 }
00180                         }
00181                         
00182                         // one of the parse functions failed, so bail as the results are unknown and there's no
00183                         // simple way to recover and pick up where we left off.  
00184                         catch(IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) 
00185                         {
00186                                 break;
00187                         }
00188                         catch (NumberFormatException ex)
00189                         {
00190                                 break;
00191                         }
00192                 }
00193                 
00194                 // transfer the vector into an appropriately sized array
00195                 if (addrList.size() > 0) 
00196                 {
00197                         response = new String[addrList.size()];
00198                         for ( int j = 0; j < addrList.size(); j++)
00199                         {
00200                                 response[j] = (String)addrList.elementAt(j);
00201                         }
00202                 }
00203                 
00204                 return response;
00205         }
00206

00217         public static String parseFullMapResult(String _str, int _addrType) 
00218         {
00219                 String fullAddress = null;
00220                 String[] addrList = getAddressList(_str);
00221                 if (addrList.length <= 0)
00222                 {
00223                         return null;
00224                 }       
00225                 
00226                 fullAddress = addrList[0];
00227                 return parseAddressResult(fullAddress, _addrType);
00228         }
00229 
00230         
00241         public static String parseAddressResult(String _str, int _addrType) {
00242                 String response = null;
00243                 String address;
00244                 String city;
00245                 String state;
00246                 String zip;
00247 
00248                 int beginIndex = 0;
00249                 int endIndex = 0;
00250 
00251                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(",", beginIndex);
00252                 address = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00253 
00254                 beginIndex = endIndex + 2;
00255                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(",", beginIndex);
00256                 city = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00257 
00258                 beginIndex = endIndex + 2;
00259                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(" ", beginIndex);
00260                 state = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00261 
00262                 beginIndex = endIndex + 1;
00263                 endIndex = _str.indexOf(",", beginIndex);
00264                 zip = _str.substring(beginIndex, endIndex);
00265 
00266                 if ((int) _addrType == ParseType.ADDRESS) {
00267                         response = address;
00268                 } else if (_addrType == ParseType.CITY) {
00269                         response = city;
00270                 } else if (_addrType == ParseType.STATE) {
00271                         response = state;
00272                 } else if (_addrType == ParseType.ZIP) {
00273                         response = zip;
00274                 } else {
00275                         response = _str;
00276                 }
00277                 return response;
00278         }
